body_html:
I think we should just change the function to indicate it should only be used with associative reductions, and sort the dims to be decreasing. Not sure what did you mean in point 2), but I'd refrain from using permute in this case.

Also not sure what did you mean in 4), can you please elaborate?

body:
I think we should just change the function to indicate it should only be used with associative reductions, and sort the dims to be decreasing. Not sure what did you mean in point 2), but I'd refrain from using permute in this case. 

Also not sure what did you mean in 4), can you please elaborate?
